titleStmt.title: A relation of a Quaker, that to the shame of his profession, attempted to bugger a mare near Colchester.
titleStmt.author: Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Satirical verse, possibly by Sir John Denham - "All in the land of Essex".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
